name: Bermuda Night Fever
description:
Pitch

A random pirate is living his random pirate’s life. Dueling his crew, drinking rum and avoiding the hold’s holes. But it seems that today his peaceful stable life comes to an end…

Holes appear in the kitchen, pirates defies you in the hold, rum in the deck, electro music ???

Gameplay

Collect the bottles, defeat your enemies, avoid the holes and the explosions !

Be careful, your time is counted...

Creators

Game Designers : Hugo Costard - Gaëtan Perré

Game Programmers : Antoine Dirion - Arthur Pejoiane - Jean-Michel Giverne

Game Artists : Hugo Dobrenel- Eliott Pineda

Sound Designer : Mathis Merolla
